gen:link.msg:message: `EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PensionCosts` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_PensionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_PensionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPensionCostsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPensionCostsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPensionCostsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfPensionCostsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
